txt.en: 'The end is near... I feel it! Angmar's grasp on the hillmen is failing, and Mordirith prepares to bring the remainder of his strength to bear upon the Trév Gállorg.\n\n'We must attack Angmar's army in Rhunendin before they can cross Rammas Deluon and move upon Aughaire. Will you lend your aid? If so, gather your allies and speak to me again when you are ready to depart.'
'The time has come, [placeholder]... Angmar is failing! They have not lost yet, however, and we must maintain our vigilance against them....'
'Have you gathered your allies? Are you ready to depart?'
Mordirith is still determined to raze Aughaire to the ground and gathers his forces in Rhunendin to put forth a major offensive against the Trév Gállorg.
Tordoron is near Gath Forthnír.\n\nTordoron has asked you to help him mount an assault against the forces of Angmar gathering in Rhunendin.
Tordoron is near Gath Forthnír.\n\nYou should speak with Tordoron regarding your victory against the Angmarim in Rhunendin.
